alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 9:17PM MST until January 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth, Lolo Pass, Evaro Hill, Missoula, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, and Bitterroot Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
